Text: Any plans on scanning and releasing the rest of "The Eagles of Rome"?
Err, there are only 3 Eagles of Rome albums made so far, and all 3 are out as scanlations already.

Really? The way the third book ended made it look like there was more to come. Big thanks for those 3 albums by the way.

These "Guilty Pleasures" are also great, very funny.

There might be more, last one was from 2011, not uncommon from euro books to be a few years between releases.
Can recommend always checking Bedetheque, a good source for info on french books :)
http://www.bedetheque.com/serie-16560-BD-Aigles-de-Rome.html

And thanks, the Guilty Pleasures books rock, Alice is working hard on #3, and i got #4 ready to scan when I get time :)
Thanks for sharing this wit us! :D

Thanks for the link. I used to live in Portugal and always had a bunch of different "European comics", but now I'm living in the US and here you can only find superhero stuff, nothing like the gems you're giving us.
